{{Infobox Oak Item |name = Sprinklotad |image = [[File:Sprinklotad.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Sprinklotad''. |dex = 0 (Bought at Mauville City in [[Hoenn]] for 10,000 {{farmpoints}}) |effect = Increases the chance of berry replants }} The '''Sprinklotad''' is a type of [[Oak Items|Oak Item]]. When equipped, it increases the chance of [[Berries]] replanting themselves if left to wither in the [[Farm]]. Unlike most other Oak Items, it is not unlocked by capturing unique Pokémon and instead can be bought from the [[Hoenn]] Berry Master in Mauville City. It also requires [[Farming Points]] to upgrade instead of Pokédollars. ==Details== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Level !! Effect !! Upgrade Requirement !!
